extendedInfo.description: Adopt your virtual puppy home today! Virtual Dog will be your best friend as long as you keep him fed, play with him, and pay attention to him. Donât start slacking though if you neglect your pup, heâll be off to pet heaven with the others. 8 mini-games availables, more mini-games coming soon.

reviews.title: Its pretty bad
reviews.comment: The thing runs too fast on my Nexus One. In-app games are no fun, have no explanation and are also too fast. The pet part makes no sense really. Don\'t waste your time with this one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Chris shut with ya bad comments until you can program yourself idiot..and anyway tamagotchi isn\'t free is it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dislike it cuz rite when u go exit and den go baq it says my dog is dead i gotta play in 24 hours datz so dum
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: :p always need to be on or else u have to wait 24 hours before playing again :P :c
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Every time i slide my phone open while i\'m playin it takes away points. i killed the poor thing before i realized what i did. And it force closes alot
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I really enjoy taking care of the dog, but the app needs updates. Maybe new mini games?!

reviews.title: Awwwwwwwww candy is so happy
reviews.comment: For all you 1 stars people... you just do everything with your puppy and he/she will be happy :)

reviews.comment: Take care of he/she and it lives happily. Neglet it and it dies. I love this app. :) i recommend all the virtual pets (v. Panda, and mycat) =)
